instruction:
Use follows format "User Information
POST create_user() /register Create user
POST login_user() /login Login user" to design all api for a

instances.output:
User Information
POST create_user() /register Create user
POST login_user() /login Login user

Movie Information
GET get_movies() /movies Retrieve all movies
GET get_movie(movie_id) /movie/<movie_id> Retrieve a specific movie
POST create_movie() /movie Create a new movie
PUT update_movie(movie_id) /movie/<movie_id> Update an existing movie
DELETE delete_movie(movie_id) /movie/<movie_id> Delete a specific movie

Booking Information
POST book_ticket() /booking Book a ticket
GET get_booking(booking_id) /booking/<booking_id> Retrieve a specific booking
GET get_user_bookings(user_id) /user/<user_id>/bookings Retrieve all bookings made by a user
PUT update_booking(booking_id) /booking/<booking_id> Update an existing booking
DELETE delete_booking(booking_id) /booking/<booking_id> Delete a specific booking

Payment Information
POST make_payment() /payment Make a payment for a booking
GET get_payment(payment_id) /payment/<payment_id> Retrieve a specific payment
GET get_user_payments(user_id) /user/<user_id>/payments Retrieve all payments made by a user
PUT update_payment(payment_id) /payment/<payment_id> Update an existing payment
DELETE delete_payment(payment_id) /payment/<payment_id> Delete a specific payment

instances.ouput:
User Information
POST create_user() /register Create user
POST login_user() /login Login user

Food Information
GET get_foods() /foods Retrieve all foods
GET get_food(food_id) /food/<food_id> Retrieve a specific food
POST create_food() /food Create a new food
PUT update_food(food_id) /food/<food_id> Update an existing food
DELETE delete_food(food_id) /food/<food_id> Delete a specific food

Drink Information
GET get_drinks() /drinks Retrieve all drinks
GET get_drink(drink_id) /drink/<drink_id> Retrieve a specific drink
POST create_drink() /drink Create a new drink
PUT update_drink(drink_id) /drink/<drink_id> Update an existing drink
DELETE delete_drink(drink_id) /drink/<drink_id> Delete a specific drink

Order Information
POST create_order() /order Create a new order
GET get_order(order_id) /order/<order_id> Retrieve a specific order
GET get_user_orders(user_id) /user/<user_id>/orders Retrieve all orders made by a user
PUT update_order(order_id) /order/<order_id> Update an existing order
DELETE delete_order(order_id) /order/<order_id> Delete a specific order

Payment Information
POST make_payment() /payment Make a payment for an order
GET get_payment(payment_id) /payment/<payment_id> Retrieve a specific payment
GET get_user_payments(user_id) /user/<user_id>/payments Retrieve all payments made by a user
PUT update_payment(payment_id) /payment/<payment_id> Update an existing payment
DELETE delete_payment(payment_id) /payment/<payment_id> Delete a specific payment
